content: bring the sunshine inside with these fun sunflower coasters really quick and easy pattern perfect for gifts and markets the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials ** * dk weight cotton yarn * 3mm crochet hook * yarn needle scissors the finished item measure approximately 4 75 x 4 75 12cm x 12cm item size may vary depending on gauge and materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/sunflower-coaster-crochet-pattern/
